resources.string: This option is not supported during a call.
AAC voice call recording is not supported.
Internal application error.\n\nMicrophone may be in use.
Sound Recorder needs microphone access to record audio.
Sound Recorder needs storage access to save recorded files.
Sound Recorder needs phone status access to prevent this app from recording while you\'re calling.
Sound Recorder needs microphone access to record audio and storage access to save recorded files.
Sound Recorder needs microphone access to record audio and phone status access to prevent this app from recording while you\'re calling.
Sound Recorder needs storage access to save recorded files and phone status access to prevent this app from recording while you\'re calling.
Sound Recorder needs microphone access to record audio, storage access to save recorded files and phone status access to prevent this app from recording while you\'re calling.
Permission error, check permission status in Settings app.
Required permissions were denied, enable them from Settings app to start recording
Can\'t access USB storage. Make sure Sound Recorder has permission to access the storage
Can\'t access SD card. Make sure Sound Recorder has permission to access the storage
Recording is not allowed during a call.
